rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: SHE IS AWESOME! I went into the class (SPAN 102) not feeling prepared after online SPAN 101 and wasn't sure that I wanted to take it. I bombed the first exam (69) and then met with her and somehow ended up with an A-. She is extremely nice and understanding and made me want to learn Spanish.
Professor Cowell was one of the best profs i've had!! She was always extremely helpful and she made sure you were prepared for tests and quizzes.

rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: She is such a nice teacher and really helpful- if you keep up with the work you will do well. She is definitely better than the other 300 teachers from what I've heard. Assignments not too difficult and you learn a lot in the class.

very very nice person. deadlines are suggestions. always very interesting, workload is reasonable. likes participation in class, but she'll pretty much like anything you say. she speaks french the entire time, which is good! get to know her outside of class
